description: False Indigo (Baptisia 'Lemon Meringue') is the perfect addition to any garden. Its bright yellow-gold flowers boast an intense color year-round, while its robust habit and deep green foliage provide texture and cover. This plant is a true perennial, with no need to replant from year to year. Plus, once established, it’s low-maintenance and drought-tolerant. Encourage pollinators with its blooms, or gardeners can clip the gorgeous flowers for fresh bouquets. It’s truly a magnificent specimen that infuses color and life into any garden.
